title: Hidden Treasure Tea Room
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, British, Catering, English, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Vegetarian, vegan, and fish. Traditional tea room close to the city centre that offers vegan choices, including cream tea, banana bread, treacle tart, berry scones with house made jam and coconut cream, and vegan pavlova (meringue with coconut cream and berries on top). Large selection of loose leaf tea drinks, including lavender chamomile tea. The business is part of the local currency scheme.
